name: The Mage the Dwarf and the Mechanic
name_original: The Mage the Dwarf and the Mechanic
description: This is my submission to the Bonfire Game Jam. The goal is to find the Great Key that the mage lost, travel through the world by clicking on the character you want to move then move them with the arrow keys. Each character has a special  abilty, the mage can shoot fireballs, the dwarf can push buttons and the mechanic can pull levers. I hope you enjoy the game!
